attributes.action: remove mps now who have announced they will not seek re-election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should mps continue to receive salary and expenses when they have decided to abdicate their responsibilities to their constituants at the earliest opportunity

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
